Text: Soon after entering the room, tears begin to form under Carla's eyes once again.

speaker: Isabel
Text: Isabel: Hey, remember what Mam√° said?

speaker: Carla
Text: Carla: ...stay strong.

speaker: Isabel
Text: Isabel: Right! She needs you to stay strong for her. It's going to be okay.

speaker: Carla
Text: Carla: ...

speaker: Isabel
Text: Isabel: What's wrong?

speaker: Carla
Text: Carla: Can I just be alone for a little bit? I just want to clear my head.

speaker: Isabel
Text: Isabel: ...Sure

speaker: Carla
Text: Carla: Thank you.

speaker: Isabel
Text: Isabel: Carla?

speaker: Carla
Text: Carla: Yeah?

speaker: Isabel
Text: Isabel: You know I always got your back right?

speaker: Carla
Text: Carla: Yes I know, you and me against the world right?

speaker: Isabel
Text: Isabel: Exactly
Before going to bed, Carla says a prayer for herself and her family, hoping that everything will be alright.

Our Father, who art in heaven,
hallowed by thy name, thy kingdom come,
thy will be done,
on earth as it is in heaven.

Give us this day our daily bread.
And forgive us our trespasses,
as we forgive those
who trespass against us.

And lead us not into temptation,
 but deliver us from evil.

For thine is the kingdom,
and the power, and the glory,
now and forever.
Amen.

speaker: Carla
Text: I love you Isabel. Thank you for being the best older sister.

speaker: Isabel
Text: Aww I love you too, silly. And don't worry too much. Jonathan is going to be back soon.

speaker: Isabel
Text: Isabel: He's going to get his green card and continue to harass all the little boys that try to talk to you.

speaker: Carla
Text: Carla: Shut up, you big dummy..

speaker: Isabel
Text: Isabel: Haha, come on, let's say a prayer for him and head to bed.

speaker: Carla
Text: Carla: Okay!
